channel.title: HCI on Home | Catherine Yu
channel.description: Recent content in HCI on Home | Catherine Yu

item.title: Effects of Picture Stimuli on the BCI P300 Speller
item.description: The research explores the possible mechanism that makes BCI speller using picture flashes produce a higher accuracy compared with those useing b/w letter flashes.

item.title: Effects of Picture Stimuli on the BCI P300 Speller
item.description: The research explores the possible mechanism that makes BCI speller using picture flashes produce a higher accuracy compared with those useing b/w letter flashes.

item.title: Can we improve the aging group's acceptance of social robots by observational learning?
item.description: In this research, we collaborate with ASUS, the leading electronics company in Taiwan, to use their social robot, Zenbo, to explore the effect of observational learning on older people’s acceptance toward the social robot.

item.title: Can we improve the aging group's acceptance of social robots by observational learning?
item.description: In this research, we collaborate with ASUS, the leading electronics company in Taiwan, to use their social robot, Zenbo, to explore the effect of observational learning on older people’s acceptance toward the social robot.
